event.text: Be part of the moment, when a new open source project gets launched! Join us in camunda's headquarter in Berlin, grab a beer and count to zero...

event.subject: Presenting camunda BPM platform
event.text:
camunda is an open source BPM platform dedicated to both Java developers and business analysts using BPMN 2.0. Come and learn what makes camunda different.
